text: Pallamano Pressano is a men's handball club from Lavis, Italy, that plays in the Serie A. ==Team== === Current squad === :Squad for the 2019–20 season ;Goalkeepers *1 Simone Facchinelli *22 Valerio Sampaolo ;Wingers ;RW: *11 Adriano Di Maggio ;LW: *15 Nicola Fadanelli *18 Alessio Giongo *97 Nicola Moser ;Line players *27 Alessio Alessandrini *69 Nicola Folgheraiter ;Back players ;LB: *7 Simone Bolognani *9 Dinko Dedović *55 Andrea Argentin ;CB: *10 Pascal d'Antino *19 Božidar Nikočević ;RB: *2 Alessandro Dallago ==External links== *Official website Pallamano Pressano
title: Pallamano Pressano
